content: Such sequences represent the UTF-16 encoding of a Unicode character. For example, 'a' is equivalent to '\u0061'. This escape method does not support characters beyond U+FFFF or you have to make use of surrogate pairs.[1]
stemmed: such sequenc repres utf-16 encod unicod charact . for exampl , 'a ' equival '\u0061 ' . thi escap method support charact beyond u+ffff make use surrog pair . [ 1 ]
